On Sep 26, 2010, at 4:47 PM, Gordon Mohr wrote:
> ...suggest there may be =
something wrong with the address you've requested the UI bind its socket to=
. What are you passing as the argument to the '-b' flag, if anything?

i so=
lved, seems a debian packaging issue
http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugrepo=
rt.cgi?bug=3D573742
(not only openjdk, also sun-jre is affected)

i've modi=
fied JAVACMD in bin/heritrix
and added -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=3Dtrue 

=
ciao
